name: Creamy Spinach Pasta Sauce
description: Creamy, rich, and delicious! This sauce is brimming with heart-healthy spinach so you can feel good about having a little more. Try on all of your favourite pastas, chicken, or fish dishes, or even as a base for soup!

ingredients.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or Spinach Dip Mix

preparation:
1. Bring broth to a boil in Multipurpose Pot - 8 Cup. Stir in spinach and dip mix. Bring to a simmer.
  2. Add cream cheese and milk, stirring until smooth.
  3. Remove from heat. Add Parmesan and stir until melted.
  4. Season with Black Pepper.
tips: Using partly-skimmed evaporated milk instead of whipping cream is a great way to reduce fat in recipes.
